item.title: ARM SBC Notes
item.description: # Serial Console screen /dev/ttyUSB0 115200 # Installing Fedora Images on host sudo dnf -y install arm-image-installer # Writing Image File Usage: arm-image-installer <options> --addconsole - Add system console to extlinux.conf --addkey= - /path/to/ssh-public-key --image=IMAGE - xz compressed image file name --media=DEVICE - media device file (/dev/[sdX|mmcblkX]) --norootpass - Remove the root password --resizefs - Resize root filesystem to fill media device --supported - List of supported hardware --target=TARGET - target board --version - Display version and exit -y - Assumes yes, will not wait for confirmation Example: arm-image-installer --image=Fedora-Rawhide.
